title: Client crashing when it should start loading the game
body:
The game just crashes and send me a bug splat error every single time I try to get in a game, right b4 loading screen pops.

I've been doing some research for the past hours trying to fix this but I'm running out of ideas already, reinstalling doesn't work, disabling DVR doesn't work(I'm on win10), ain't the fullscreen error as far as I know that pops after loading  and I've also tried something else I think but don't remember all of em already.

replies.body: Bugsplats are usually caused by bad drivers, game files, or something else that fails to load the game properly.  In addition to the steps already taken, you should go over the instructions found in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.  Those steps should help fix things up, and I recommend testing it out in custom games.  I hope that helps!
